name: Glide With Holes
description:
My first game jam ^^

don't worry, the level is saved automatically :)

-The objective is to go to the earth

-Get speed bonus with black holes ans meteor

-Z + Left Shift, Space for meteor bonus

-All the models and scripts are made by me

-I used Unity2019.3.1f1, Blender, and photoshop

-Only the Skybox SpaceSkies Free is external to me

-leave me a comment if you find a bug or something to modify ;)

-Im 15 french guys 🥖
